thread.title: From Sex-Crimes Prosecutor to Best-Selling Novelist

author: wsjcom
title: From Sex-Crimes Prosecutor to Best-Selling Novelist
text:
Linda Fairstein, a former New York City sex-crimes prosecutor and best-selling novelist, knows how to persevere.
When Ms. Fairstein graduated law school, she believes she was turned downed for many jobs because she was a woman. “It was enormously frustrating to find that doors were closed,” she says in this week’s Secrets of Wealthy Women podcast.
She...
